name: Radical War Battleground
description:
Welcome to the extreme game.

Take part in a shootout with a steep action, where you will rob using weapons, gadgets, cars and money!
Survive to the end or take risks to everyone in this cool action game!

Extreme and free game series of the battle royale.
Take part in a shootout with a steep action, our city,
where participants sweep past on steep motorcycles as well, sports cars and helicopters with tanks.
Look for weapons, destroy buildings, manage jetpack considering all the beauty of urban traffic.
Money - money is needed in the game, to buy skins, weapons, steep wheelbarrows and military vehicles, aircraft, helicopter, tank and much more.
Choose your hero, customize it to your liking.

Features:
- A large number of levels
- Online game mode
- Cool soundtrack
- High optimization


Welcome to the world of lawlessness the battle royal.
